review: I am disappointed that I don't seem to be able to use my Acorn subscription on the Fire TV stick. Otherwise it seems great. Better than anything at the price.

review: Stick meant my requirements, do not appreciate the fact I was charged for Amazon Prime without my consent or knowledge of it

review: Was a gift and we are so happy!!!

review: Day one works great!!!!! HAPPYDay two HDCP unauthorized content disabled blue screen, but hey i can hear my movie.  NOT HAPPY!!!will be returning.do not buy unless you have a brand new tv close to your router and even then good luck.

review: Great device! Love how easy it is and being able to move it between TV's!!
